name: Spawn: In the Demon's Hand
summary: Spawn: In the Demon's Hand is a video game developed and published by Capcom for the Dreamcast and arcade. It is based on the comic book character Spawn created by Todd McFarlane and produced by Image Comics. A port was planned for the PlayStation 2 as a launch title but it was later canceled.
